column2: "Ah, <%me>, you're covered in sweat. What happened?"
"The Volcanic Caverns on Amduscia? Hmm, just hearing the name makes me feel hot."
"The temperature on the ship is highly regulated, so it must be hard to adjust to the heat. Are you handling it alright?"
"If you say it's fine, then I'm glad, but don't overdo it and put yourself at risk."
"If you want to talk, I'm always here."
